about.text: The best and most interesting things are created thanks to unusual connections. Specialization can give us accuracy. Specialization combined with interdisciplinary can ensure precision and creativity. I am an artist with an analytical mind. When I do something - I try to do it the best I can. Musical education and working in this profession have taught me to be scrupulous: I am creative, but also precise. I create websites, I play the bassoon, I am a bassoon school teacher - in all these aspects I strive for perfection.

skills.text: I am working with these programming languages and tools:
skills.html5: HTML defines the structure of websites, how the document will look like in the browser, add hyperlinks, graphics, multimedia files, and forms to the page.
skills.css3: describes the element layout on the page; defines the appearance of the document - layout, colours, fonts, margins, background, etc.
skills.JavaScript: g programming language, to create interactivity on the website by reacting to events (e.g. on mouse clicks).
skills.jQuery: a javascript library that simplifies programming, sometimes instead of writing multiple lines in js, we can replace the code with even one jquery line.
skills.sass: a scripting language code that is processed into CSS result files, it helps to create and maintain CSS in a much better organized, readable way.
skills.gulp: a tool for work automation, used when working with SASS.
skills.git: a tool that allows you to save and track changes in the project's code, also an insight into your work history; it facilitates working on a team of several people.
skills.rwd: (Responsive Web Design): a website design technique that adapts the layout of the website to the size of the browser window.
skills.react: JavaScript library, which is created to build graphical interfaces of web applications used, e.g. in Facebook
skills.ajax: a combination of technology that allows you to download data from a server using Java Server and place it on the page, without reloading this page, which happens in the background, also without interference in the appearance and functionality of the site.
skills.wordpress: one of content management systems (CMS) used to design websites, online stores and blogs, does not require knowledge of coding in HTML, CSS, JS.
